title: ‘The Orchard’ Review: Russians and Robots
sub_head: At the Baryshnikov Arts Center’s adaptation of Chekhov’s “The Cherry Orchard” technology takes center stage
body:
New York
When the most striking performer in a production of a Chekhov play is a giant robot, dipping, swirling, all but dancing, and ever at center stage, perhaps things are not as they should be.
